EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.Email - Save the Date
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date for Tricentis Partner Day 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Before jumping into Accelerate 2015 we would like to take the opportunity to offer our partners something special: we want to give you an exclusive update on our products and strategy, as well as the opportunity to network with all partners.
Partner Day 2015 October 21st, 2015 2:00 P.M. – 8:00 P.M. Vienna, Austria Registration is free of charge!
{{my.ical}}
Stay tuned for the Call for Papers, our Sponsoring Options, and the Registration.
We look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
